# SMSService.Error

**Enumeration**

A type to define errors that can occur when performing SMS operations.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Error
```

## Identifying errors

- **SMSService.Error.notSupported**: The operation isn’t supported.
- **SMSService.Error.permanentFailure**: The operation failed permanently.
- **SMSService.Error.temporaryFailure**: The operation failed temporarily.
- **SMSService.Error.unknown**: An unknown problem caused the error.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Error
- Hashable
- LocalizedError
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: An unknown problem caused the error.
